item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

5:30PM - Power Hour Workshop (topic TBA). This is exclusive to members of BostonAREIA. Visit http://www.bostonarei... for details.

Main Meeting at 6:30 PM -
Networking Holiday Extravaganza -
Monthly Meeting - Come find out WHY Boston AREIA has the BEST Networking in the area!

Bring your deals, bring your business cards, bring your comfortable shoes! You'll want to speak to as many people as possible in this all-evening networking event. And we'll make sure we identify the people you want and need to speak to at the beginning of the evening, so you don't miss anyone who can help you build your business!

And we'll be announcing a surprise! Be sure to be at this EVENT!



Location: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma
Free to Boston AREIA members (please see website for details - http://www.BostonAREI..., Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association December Meetup
